subject: HttpUnit throwing "Unknown Host Exception" in https://
msgSnippet: I ve got Tomcat set up to serve both http and https and have written a toy app to investigate some problems on another server in switching between http and
messageBody:
I've got Tomcat set up to serve both http and https and have written a toy app to investigate some problems on another server in switching between http and https.

The app is a few .jsp with links, some of which point to http://localhost:8080 and some to https://localhost:8443
Things work fine when I hit the app with Internet Explorer, but httpUnit tests work for http but throw UnknownHostException on https. What might I need to set up.

Thanks,

George McKinney
